title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: April 19, 2018 / 5:34 PM / Updated an hour ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 4 Min Read Apr 19 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles matches on Thursday ..
